prAnyAniq pAtrA#Ni yuqjyantEq nAnyAniq yAni# parAqcInA#ni prayuqjyantEq&mumEqva tairlOqkamaqBi ja#yatiq parA#~givaq hya#sau lOqkO yAniq pu#naHprayuqjyanta# iqmamEqva tairlOqkamaqBi ja#yatiq puna#H punarivaq hya#yaM ~MlOqkaH prAnyAniq 
pAtrA#Ni yuqjyantEq nAnyAniq yAni# parAqcInA#ni prayuqjyantEq tAnyanvOSha#dhayaqH parA# Bavantiq yAniq puna#H- [  ] 39
